Package index

All functions

Genotype-class Genotype
A function to generate objects of class 'Genotype'
Hormone-class Hormone
A function to generate objects of class 'Hormone'
Network-class Network
A function to generate objects of class 'Network'
altSourceToStimulant()
A function to convert altSource inputs to stimulants.
buildHormone()
A function to build a hormone object
buildModel()
A function to generate equations from a network object
buildNetwork()
A function for building a network object
consistencyCheck()
A function to check the internal consistency of a Network object.
convertSBGNdiagram()
A function that converts an SBGN-ML text file into a network object
coregulators()
A function that creates a string with coregulators multiplied together
differenceString()
A function to build the difference equation including delays
exogenousScreen()
A function to generate all combinations of two vectors containing the values to be screened for two nodes. This function will also include the possibility of no exogenous values being provided in the form of NA.
exploreEdges()
A function to test how network behavior changes in response to changing the nature of edge types.
fastPlot()
A plot to quickly inspect the progression of a simulation.
finalStates()
A function to pull the final states from a set of simulations.
generateC()
A function to generate a C script which will execute a simulation of the network given a starting condition.
generateEdgeList()
A function to generate a data frame which lists all of the edges of a network.
generateEquation()
A function to generate an equation for a specific node
generateGeneToNodeList()
a function to map the genes that effect nodes in a network
genotypeScreen()
A function to generate genotype screens.
getExampleDiagram()
a function to move the example .sbgn file into a folder of the users choice.
getSubmapNodes()
A function to pull out information from with in submaps
langConversion
A data.frame containing the language conventions and their equivalence of the PSoup package, and the SBGN languages 'activity flow' and 'entity relationship'.
languageConversion()
A function to convert SBGN language to PSoup language
listGenotypes()
A function to list all objects of class genotype in the current environment
listNodes()
A function to list all objects of class hormone in the current environment
modifierPriorScreen()
A function to generate a screen of modifier conditions based on a set of prior distributions.
numCombn()
A function to calculate the number of unique combinations of a vector of length n of sample size r.
peaNetwork
Definition for the peaNetwork object.
plot(<simData>)
A function to comparatively plot the outcomes of different simulations
print.Network
This is a function which specifies the print method for objects of class Network.
randomStartScreen()
A function to generate a number of random starting point reassignments.
report()
A function to produce a report of simulation progression
reportCondition()
A function to report any deviation from the baseline for simulations
restoreBaseModel()
A function to restore the base model.
setupSims()
A wrapper function that allows you to run simulations of a network under many different conditions.
simulateNetwork()
A function to simulate a network
stabilityVector()
A function to create a vector that reports whether simulations have managed to reach stability by the maximum timestep.
tidyScreen()
A function to make sure that data.frames containing conditions to screen are organised correctly. The wild-type condition is made to come first, and any duplicate rows are removed.

Developed by Nicole Fortuna, Christine Beveridge, ARC Centre of Excellence for Plant Success in Nature and Agriculture.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
